attributes.review: This app was obviously created by primitive apes who don’t understand the modern era. I found the app bleake and boring😴😴 no creativity. No flavor. Not helpful at all🤧 I’d like to see some major changes... or better yet just take it down completely!!
attributes.title: BOOOO RACISM

attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app I got a notification that someone was trying to hack into all my accounts and they were trying to change my passwords. Disgusting
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: this app always lags and it makes me so mad. there’s a million ads and it drives me insane!!!! this is such a bad app i can’t even describe it!!! this is such a disappointment to the us!!! it took agessss to download and it was a shame when i opened it!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I was told that as soon as it downloaded, the handsome, gorgeous, magical Matthew Gray Gubler and his side kick Shemar Moore would appear at my front door and sweep me off to Hawaii for a luxury vacation. Did that happen, NO! Very disappointed. Boooooooooo👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻
attributes.title: Disappointed😞

attributes.review:
Water 💧 
Earth ⛰
Fire 🔥 
Air 💨
Long ago the four nations lived in harmony

Then everything changed when the fire nation attacked

Only the avatar master of all four elements could stop them

But when the world needed him most he vanished

100 years passed and my brother and I discovered the new avatar

An air bender named Aang 

And although his air bending skills are great he has a lot to learn before he’s ready to save anyone

✨But I believe Aang can save the world✨
attributes.title: #Aang2020

attributes.review: Makes my phone crash every time I open it and I have to restart my phone. My phone also started to delete things I think the app gave my phone a virus.

attributes.review: Overall unsatisfied by the app, makes my phone crash, uses a lot of battery, slow to work, just confusing.
attributes.title: Dislike.
